<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
UntypedLit occurs when a composite literal omits a required type
identifier.

Example:
 type outer struct{
 	inner struct { i int }
 }

 var _ = outer{inner: {1}}
```
